title: Opulence RSE Watch Face
summary: Fully customizable watch face concept. Layers are numbered and named
developerAddress: 2036 avenue  de la salle, Montreal, Quebec, Canada, H1V 2K5
description: OPULENCE RSE Watch Face.     Give it 5 stars and good ratings it is the price i charge on this one!!!Paint by number concept fully customizable watch face. All layers are numbered and clearly named.Build in Photoshop, imported by layers and tinted in Watchmaker so you can apply the colors you want.If you don't want to paint it, I've painted one just for you. it is included in the APK file.Dynamic highlights on the metal discs twist your wrist and they rotates like real highlights.Alternating weather conditions, current temperature, high and low, humidity and wind speed.Dimmed mode design for optimal visibility and style.Revolving disks assemble time in the right side window. mechanical watch and phone power reserve.For Us setup put the opacity of these layers (08, 17a) at 100% and these (09 and 17b) at 0% andchange the formula on layer (23- Wind speed) to the default watchmaker mph tag for kmh keep my formula.For International setup put the opacity of these layers (09 and 17b) at 100% and these (08 and 17a) at 0%.To install this watch face get the Premium version of Watchmaker available on the play store.Watchmaker : http://goo.gl/FMxUfYFor Android Wear 5
descriptionHTML:
OPULENCE RSE Watch Face. Give it 5 stars and good ratings it is the price i charge on this one!!!

Paint by number concept fully customizable watch face. All layers are numbered and clearly named.

Build in Photoshop, imported by layers and tinted in Watchmaker so you can apply the colors you want.

If you don't want to paint it, I've painted one just for you. it is included in the APK file.

Dynamic highlights on the metal discs twist your wrist and they rotates like real highlights.

Alternating weather conditions, current temperature, high and low, humidity and wind speed.

Dimmed mode design for optimal visibility and style.

Revolving disks assemble time in the right side window. mechanical watch and phone power reserve.

For Us setup put the opacity of these layers (08, 17a) at 100% and these (09 and 17b) at 0% and
change the formula on layer (23- Wind speed) to the default watchmaker mph tag for kmh keep my formula.
For International setup put the opacity of these layers (09 and 17b) at 100% and these (08 and 17a) at 0%.

To install this watch face get the Premium version of Watchmaker available on the play store.
Watchmaker : http://goo.gl/FMxUfY

For Android Wear 5
comments: I keep coming back to this face.  The time of day is a little hard to see sometimes with certain color combos.  But the face overall is just so gorgeous.  I can't help but keep on coming back.
Verrrry nice indeed!    I'm feeling a bit dense, so how do you (can you?) change from 24- to 12-hour format?
Did not work Did not show up after installing on my Samsung Galaxy S7 Active or my LG Urbane
Wear6 It does not work on huawei watch android 6 . I cant even see it icon on my watch
Will not Sync Does not Sync with my G Watch. Such a shame as it looks great. uninstalled.
Not working Doesn't work on Huwaei watch! Is there a way?
